sect1.title: Installing Perl-5.8.2
sect1.screen: Estimated build time: 0.8 SBU Estimated required disk space: 74 MB

sect2.title: Installation of Perl
sect2.para: First adapt some hard-wired paths to the C library:
The meaning of the configure option:

listitem.para: -Dstatic_ext='IO Fcntl': This tells Perl to build the minimum set of static extensions needed for running the Coreutils test suite in the next chapter.

sect2.para: Then copy these tools and their libraries:

screen.userinput: cp perl pod/pod2man /tools/bin mkdir -p /tools/lib/perl5/5.8.2 cp -R lib/* /tools/lib/perl5/5.8.2
